translations: v．争论，争吵：长时间或激烈地争论或争吵。
n．争论，争吵：长时间或激烈的争论或争吵。

sentences.sentence: The struggles and wrangles of the lads for her hand in a jig were an amusement to her—no more; and when they became fierce she rebuked them.
sentences.translation: 小伙子们竞相争着要同她跳一曲吉格舞只让她感到好笑——仅此而已；当他们闹得凶了，她就责备他们。

sentences.sentence: It is the latest in a series of legal wrangles involving Apple.
sentences.translation: 这最新的，在一系列的法律争议中涉及到苹果公司。

sentences.sentence: But after the latest wrangles Mr Netanyahu will worry he may do so anyway.
sentences.translation: 但在最近的一次较量之后，内塔尼亚胡要担心他无论如何都要这么做了。
